title: Need suggestions regarding kcet
content: I got 220 marks in pcm and out of 180 marks in kcet how much do I need to get a ranking of 15-20k ?cast is general merit 2B please help me with this one

comments.body: I had 231 marks in pcm last year and got a kcet score of 118 around. My rank was 16k.(ðŸ˜­)
So this means I'm completely f.. up right now, damn
So this means I'm completely f.. up right now, damn
Nah score around 140 in kcet and you'll prolly get around 5k rank ig which is decent if you have reservation
I have no I idea what reservations I have, the above mentioned details are the only ones I know

Oh ok thanks, I had I doubt if I try writing the 2nd exam for pcm to increase by marks in pcm, as I now have 220 marks, if I increase my marks with help of the 2nd exam will they consider my increased marks in kcet as I am doing this just for the sole purpose to enhance my ranking
We didn't have such exams I can't  clearly address it, so if they conduct and announce results before kcet rank announcements, there is a high probability of considering the new total
Yeah they confirmed it in a press meet. 2nd can also be considered for kcet.
